maqras.text: 37|145|hananim-i geuleul bulmoui haebyeon-eulo gujehani geuneun byeongdeul-eo iss-eoss deola
37|146|hananim-eun jolongbag namuga geu ui wilo jalage hayeossnola
37|147|hananim-i sibmanmyeong isang-ui baeg seongdeul-ege geuleul bonaessdeoni
37|148|geudeul-i mid-eum-eul gagyeossdeola geulihayeo hananim-eun geudeul-ege jamsidong-an geudeul-ui salm-eul jeulgidolog heolaghayeossnola
37|149|geudaeui junim-egeneun ttaldeulman issgo geudeul-egeneun adeulman issneunji mul-eobola
37|150|animyeon hananim-i cheonsaleul yeo seong-eulo changjohan geos-eul geudeul-i moggyeog ilado haessneunyo
37|151|sillo geudeul-i malhaneun geos-eun kkumyeonaen geos-e bulgwahanila
37|152|hananimkkeseo jason-eul nahneunda hani geudeul-eun geojishaneun jadeul-ila
37|153|hananimkkeseo adeulboda ttaldeul eul seontaeghaessdan mal-inyo
37|154|eotteon iyulo geuleohge pandanha neunyo
37|155|neohuineun gyohun-eul badji anihaess deonyo
37|156|animyeon neohuiga eotteon bunmyeonghan gwonneung-ilado issdan mal-inyo
37|157|neohuiga jinsil-ilamyeon gwonneung-eul ibjunghaneun neohuiui seongseoleul gajyeoola
37|158|geudeul-eun hananimgwa yeongma sai ga hyeol-yeongwangyelago kkumyeodaedeola geu leona yeongmadeul-eun jasindeul-i hananim ap-e seoji anihamyeon anidoem-eul jal algo issnola
37|159|geudeul-i myosahan geosgwaneun gwangye ga eobs-eusin hananimkke yeong-gwang-i iss-eu soseo
37|160|geuleona seongsilhan hananim-ui jong deul-eun geuleohji ani hanila
37|161|neohuiwa geuligo neohuiga sungbae haneun usangdeul-eun
37|162|eoneu nugudo hananim-e gwanha yeo yuhoghal su eobsnola
37|163|geuleona seuseulo taoleuneun bul jiog-eulo ganeun janeun je-oela
37|164|jueojin immuga issneun ulineun eoneu nugudo geuleohji anihamyeo
37|165|ulineun jul-eul jieo
37|166|hananim-eul chanmihaneun jadeul-ila
37|167|geuleona geuleohge malhaneun jadeul-eun
37|168|seonjodeullobuteo uliege me sejiga iss-eossdamyeon
37|169|sillo ulineun seongsilhan hananim-ui jongdeul-i doeeoss-eulila
37|170|ie kkulan-i wass-euna geudeul-eungeoyeoghayeoss-euni geudeul-eun god alge doe lila
37|171|hananim-ui malsseum-eun geubun-ui jongdeul-eul tonghayeo imi jeonhayeo jyeoss-euni
37|172|geudeul-eun sillo seunglihalila
37|173|geuligo hananim-ui gundaeneun jeongbog-eul hal geos-ini
37|174|jamsi dong-an geudeullobuteo tteol-eojyeo
37|175|geudeul-eul jikyeobola geudeuldo jikyeo bolila
37|176|geudeul-eun hananim-ui beol-eul seodulleo guham-inyo
37|177|geuleona beol-i geudeul-ui neolb-eun tteul-e ileuni gyeong-gobadgo juuihaji anihan saaghan jadeul-ui achim-i bi cheonhadeola
37|178|geuleomeulo jamsi dong-an geudeullobuteo tteol-eojyeo
37|179|geudeul-eul jikyeobola geudeuldo jikyeobolila
37|180|yeong-gwang-gwa gwonneung-eulo chungmanhan geudaeui junim-eul chan-yanghala geubun-eun geu deul-i myosahan geosgwaneun gwangyega eobsno la
37|181|seonjijadeul wie pyeong-an-i iss-eulgeos-ila
37|182|man-yuui junim-isin hananim-i yeo chanmileul bad-eusoseo
38|1|sadeu gyohun-eulo chungmanhan kkulan eun jinlila
38|2|geuleona bulsinjadeul-eun geomanhae hago uisim-eulo bulsinhana
38|3|hananim-eun geudeul ijeon sedaedeul-eul-eolmana manh-i myeolmangke hayeoss-eumyeo geu ttae geudeul-eun eunhyeleul guhamyeo solichyeoss euna imi sigan-i jinaga beolyeossdeo la
38|4|geudeul-ege han gyeong-gojaga ileuleoss-eul ttae bulsinjadeul-eun nollamyeo malhagil ineun geojishaneun masulsala
38|5|geuga yeoleo sindeul-eul yuilsin ha nanim-eulo mandeul-eo beolyeossdan mal-inyo sillo igeos-eun nollaun il-ila
38|6|geudeul gaunde udumeolideul-i danghwanghayeo tteonamyeo malhagil dol-aga neo huiui sindeul-eul sungbaeham-e innaehala igeos-eun sillo gyehoegdoen eotteon geos-ila
38|7|ulineun jigeumkkajiui jong-gyoeseo ileon mal-eul deul-eobon jeog-i eobs-eoss-euni igeos-eun kkumyeonaen uhwa-e bulgwahanola

38|8|uli gaundeseo geuege geu mesejileul bonaessdan mal-inyo lago malha myeo geudeul-eun hananim-ui gyesie uisim hago issdeogla ineun geudeul-i geudeul-ui uisim-eulo hananim-ui beol-eul ajig mas boji anihaessgi ttaemun-ila
38|9|animyeon geudeul-i wonhaneun daelo gwonneung-gwa suyeohasim-eulo chungmanhasin junim-ui eunhyeui bomulchang-goleul gajigo issdan mal-inyo
38|10|animyeon haneulgwa daejiwa geu saiui manmul-eul geudeul-i jugwanhago iss dan mal-inyo geuleohdamyeon eotteohan bangbeob eulodeunji haneul-e oleula hala
38|11|geuleona geudeul-i yeonhabhan eotteon gundaedo geogieseo myeolmangha-eossnola
38|12|geudeul ijeon-ui seonjijadeul-eul geo yeoghan noaui baegseong-gwa adeuwa oman ham-ui ju-in palaoui baegseong-i geulaess nola
38|13|samudeuwa lusgwa supsog-ui donglyodeuldo geuleohan yeonhabgun ieossnola
38|14|geudeul jung seonjijadeul-eul geoyeoghaji anihan baegseong-i eobs-eoss-euni hana nim-ui beol-i geudeul-ege ileuge doeeoss nola
38|15|ideul-eun danji hanbeon-ui napalsolileul gidaligo issnani geugeos-i i leul ttaeneun yuyedoel su eobsnola
38|16|geudeul-eun malhagileul gyesan-ui nal-i ileugi jeon-e seodulleo beol-eul naelyeobolago hadeola
38|17|geudeul-i malhaneun geos-e innaehala geuligo hananim-ui jong-imyeo ganghan namseong-in diwis-eul sang-gihala sillo geu neun hananimkke gwiuihan jala
38|18|sillo hananim-eun sancheon-eulo hayeogeum geuwa hamkke achimgwa jeonyeog-eulo habjanghayeo hananim-eul chan-yanghala haessnola
38|19|geulihayeo moin saedeul modugageuwa hamkke hananimkke sunjong hayeossdeo la
38|20|hananim-eun geuui wang-gug-eul gangha ge hasa geuege jihyewa bunmyeonghan pandanlyeog-eul jueossnola
